payload.name: slos-error-budgets
payload.title: SLOs + error budgets: reliability becomes an optimization constraint
payload.formal: error budget = allowed failures within window; treat reliability as spendable.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2’s autonomy levels should “spend” reliability budget. High-risk autonomous actions must require more budget headroom (i.e., be conservative when budget is low). Encode this into gates and policies.
